mapper.select: select board_number, board_title , board_content , board_time , member_number, board_view, board_recommend FROM TB_BOARD ORDER BY board_number desc LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{amount};
select board_number, board_title, board_content, board_title, member_number, board_view, board_recommend from tb_board order by board_number desc limit 2;

SELECT board_number, board_title , board_content , board_time , member_number, board_view, board_recommend FROM TB_BOARD WHERE board_title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR board_content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') ORDER BY board_number desc LIMIT #{p.pageStart}, #{p.amount};

SELECT b.board_number, b.board_title, b.board_content, b.board_time, b.board_view, b.board_recommend, m.member_number, m.member_nickname from tb_board b join tb_member m using(member_number) WHERE board_number = #{boardNumber};
